review: Dont buy it.Online? Its dead. Got matched up with the same guy 5 times. Seriously?Online lag is terrible.Story is terrible, ending feels like they ran out of ideas.Micro-transactions, cant press a few buttons? Pay to press fewer buttons.Just dont buy it.
